inclusion.criterion: Must have undergone the onset of spontaneous or surgical menopause
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Diagnosis of osteoporosis on the basis of an axial lumbar spine, femoral neck or total hip BMD
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Must have at least three contiguous lumbar vertebrae (L1-L4) that are evaluable by DXA for BMD
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: No clinically significant abnormal findings in the medical history, physical exam or nasal exam
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: No clinically significant abnormal laboratory values at the screening assessment
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Use of any intravenous bisphosphonate in the past 24 months, or >2 doses of intravenous bisphosphonate ever
exclusion.label: unknown
